text: Prakash Karat (born 7 February 1948) is an Indian communist politician. He was the General Secretary of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) from 2005 to 2015. Karat was born in Letpandan, Kachin, Burma, to a Malayali family. He is married to fellow communist politician Brinda Karat. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:Malayali people Category:Politicians from New Delhi
title: Prakash Karat
